name: Colorpull (early alpha)
description:
Overview

Colorpull is a a color-based puzzle game.

I believe part of the fun is figuring out what to do by yourself.

Controls
  • Mouse
  • R - Flip through different resolutions (in case of bad performance)
Technical Info

Built using TypeScript with custom WebGL code (no 3rd party framework).

Future

The development is on hiatus at the moment, I want to see if there's an interest, so please leave a comment to tell me what you think about the direction. :)
